Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 289th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/14/2015...
Injured on 6/27/2015 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/27/2017 to a 5-year deal worth $5,200,000 per year...
Injured on 5/27/2019 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/20/2020.
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (C) on 4/22/2020.
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Atlanta on 2/13/2021 (Going to ATL: P Louis Rickman, P Carlos Valderrama. Going to STL: P Marc Jenkins, 2B Rene Espitia)...
Injured on 8/16/2021 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
